text.author: Nadia, Avery Schmidt, Aroly Seven and others (see URL)
text.title: How to Flirt Through Instant Messaging
text.summary: This guide to flirting via instant messaging suggests starting bu saying 'hi' and asking about someone's day, asking for help with work or school, or asking about their username, then moving on to musical likes and dislikes and making jokes, while avoiding self-deprecation, sappiness, excessive flattery or jokes at other people's expense.
